00580 inline CComplexImage::ReRowIterator CComplexImage::ReRow(UINT32 i)
00581 {
00582         return ReRowIterator(m_Image.ppAllScanLinesRe[i+m_Image.Origo.y],GetMinX()+m_Image.Origo.x, GetMaxX()+m_Image.Origo.x);
00583 }
00584 
00585 inline CComplexImage::ReConstRowIterator CComplexImage::ReConstRow(UINT32 i) const
00586 {
00587         return ReConstRowIterator(m_Image.ppAllScanLinesRe[i+m_Image.Origo.y],GetMinX()+m_Image.Origo.x, GetMaxX()+m_Image.Origo.x);
00588 }
00589 
00590 inline CComplexImage::ReColumnIterator CComplexImage::ReColumn(UINT32 i)
00591 {
00592         return ReColumnIterator(i+m_Image.Origo.x,m_Image.ppAllScanLinesRe[GetMinY()+m_Image.Origo.y],
00593                                                 m_Image.ppAllScanLinesRe[GetMaxY()+m_Image.Origo.y-1]-m_Image.ByteWidth/sizeof(FLOAT32),
00594                                                 m_Image.ByteWidth/sizeof(FLOAT32));
00595 }
00596

00628 inline bool CComplexImage::IsEmpty() const
00629 {
00630         return (m_Image.pPixelStreamRe==NULL);
00631 }
00632 
00633 inline FLOAT32 CComplexImage::GetPixelRe(int x, int y) const
00634 {
00635         UINT16 border=m_Image.BorderSize;
00636         /* adjust origo offset */
00637         x += m_Image.Origo.x;
00638         y += m_Image.Origo.y;
00639         
00640         if ((x>=-border) && (x<(int) m_Image.Width+border) &&
00641                 (y>=-border) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+border))
00642         {
00643                 return m_Image.ppMatrixRe[y][x];
00644         }
00645         else
00646         {
00647                 ostringstream ost;
00648                 ost << "CComplexImage::GetPixelRe(" << x << "," << y << ") Outside image and border" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00649                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00650                 return 0;
00651         }
00652 }
00653 
00654 inline FLOAT32 CComplexImage::GetPixelIm(int x, int y) const
00655 {
00656         UINT16 border=m_Image.BorderSize;
00657         /* adjust origo offset */
00658         x += m_Image.Origo.x;
00659         y += m_Image.Origo.y;
00660         
00661         if ((x>=-border) && (x<(int) m_Image.Width+border) &&
00662                 (y>=-border) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+border))
00663         {
00664                 return m_Image.ppMatrixIm[y][x];
00665         }
00666         else
00667         {
00668                 ostringstream ost;
00669                 ost << "CComplexImage::GetPixelIm(" << x << "," << y << ") Outside image and border" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00670                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00671                 return 0;
00672         }
00673 }

00675 inline FLOAT32 CComplexImage::GetPixelRe(const CPoint2D<int>& Pos) const
00676 {
00677         UINT16 border=m_Image.BorderSize;
00678         //* adjust origo offset
00679         int x = Pos.GetX()+m_Image.Origo.x;
00680         int y = Pos.GetY()+m_Image.Origo.y;
00681         
00682         if ((x>=-border) && (x<(int) m_Image.Width+border) &&
00683                 (y>=-border) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+border))
00684         {
00685                 return m_Image.ppMatrixRe[y][x];
00686         }
00687         else
00688         {
00689                 ostringstream ost;
00690                 ost << "CComplexImage::GetPixelRe" << Pos << " Outside image and border" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00691                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00692                 return 0;
00693         }
00694 }

00747 
00748 inline bool CComplexImage::SetPixel(int x, int y, FLOAT32 Re,FLOAT32 Im)
00749 {
00750         UINT16 border=m_Image.BorderSize;
00751         /* adjust origo offset */
00752         x += m_Image.Origo.x;
00753         y += m_Image.Origo.y;
00754         
00755         if((x>=-border) && (x<(int) m_Image.Width+border) &&
00756                 (y>=-border) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+border))
00757         {
00758                 m_Image.ppMatrixRe[y][x]=Re; 
00759                 m_Image.ppMatrixIm[y][x]=Im;
00760                 return true;
00761         }
00762         else
00763         {
00764                 ostringstream ost;
00765                 ost << "CComplexImage::SetPixel(" << x << "," << y << ") Outside image and border" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00766                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00767                 return false;
00768         }
00769 }
00770 
00771 inline bool CComplexImage::SetPixel(const CPoint2D<int>& Pos, FLOAT32 Re, FLOAT32 Im)
00772 {
00773         UINT16 border=m_Image.BorderSize;
00774         //* adjust origo offset
00775         int x = Pos.GetX()+m_Image.Origo.x;
00776         int y = Pos.GetY()+m_Image.Origo.y;
00777         
00778         if((x>=-border) && (x<(int) m_Image.Width+border) &&
00779                 (y>=-border) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+border))
00780         {
00781                 m_Image.ppMatrixRe[y][x]=Re;
00782                 m_Image.ppMatrixIm[y][x]=Im;
00783                 return true;
00784         }
00785         else
00786         {
00787                 ostringstream ost;
00788                 ost << "CComplexImage::SetPixel" << Pos << " Outside image and border" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00789                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00790                 return false;
00791         }
00792 }

00953 
00954 inline int CComplexImage::GetMinX() const
00955 {
00956         if (ROIActive()==true)
00957                 return m_ROIUpperLeft.GetX();
00958         else
00959                 return -m_Image.Origo.x;
00960 }
00961 
00962 inline int CComplexImage::GetMinY() const
00963 {
00964         if (ROIActive()==true)
00965                 return m_ROIUpperLeft.GetY();
00966         else
00967                 return -m_Image.Origo.y;
00968 }
00969 
00970 inline int CComplexImage::GetMaxX() const
00971 {
00972         if (ROIActive()==true)
00973                 return m_ROILowerRight.GetX();
00974         else
00975                 return m_Image.Width-m_Image.Origo.x;
00976 }
00977 
00978 inline int CComplexImage::GetMaxY() const
00979 {
00980         if (ROIActive()==true)
00981                 return m_ROILowerRight.GetY();
00982         else
00983                 return m_Image.Height-m_Image.Origo.y;
00984 }
00985 
00986 inline CPoint2D<int> CComplexImage::GetOrigo() const
00987 {
00988         return CPoint2D<int>(m_Image.Origo.x,m_Image.Origo.x);
00989 }
00990 
00991 inline ORIGIN CComplexImage::GetOrigin() const
00992 {
00993         // get the origin of image
00994         return m_Image.Origin;
00995 }
00996 
00997 inline void CComplexImage::SetOrigo(UINT16 x, UINT16 y)
00998 {
00999         SetOrigo(CPoint2D<int>(x,y));
01000 }
01001 
01002 inline void CComplexImage::SetOrigo(const CPoint2D<int>& Pos)
01003 {
01004         m_Image.Origo.x=Pos.GetX();
01005         m_Image.Origo.y=Pos.GetY();
01006         if (m_ROIActive==true)
01007         {
01008                 m_ROIUpperLeft  -= Pos;
01009                 m_ROILowerRight -= Pos;
01010         }
01011 }
01012 
01013 inline bool CComplexImage::SetROI(const CPoint2D<INT32>& UL, const CPoint2D<INT32>& LR)
01014 {
01015         if ((UL.GetX()>=LR.GetX()) || (UL.GetY()>=LR.GetY()))
01016         {
01017                 ostringstream ost;
01018                 ost << "CComplexImage::SetROI() UL " << UL << " greater than LR " << LR << 
01019                         " in at least one of the dimensions" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
01020                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
01021                 return false;
01022         }
01023         // we check with the MinX, MaxX, MinY and MaxY without ROI
01024         INT32 MinXNoROI=-m_Image.Origo.x;
01025         INT32 MinYNoROI=-m_Image.Origo.y;
01026         INT32 MaxXNoROI=m_Image.Width-m_Image.Origo.x;
01027         INT32 MaxYNoROI=m_Image.Height-m_Image.Origo.y;
01028         if ((UL.GetX()<MinXNoROI) || (UL.GetY()<MinYNoROI) || 
01029                     (LR.GetX()>MaxXNoROI) || (LR.GetY()>MaxYNoROI))
01030         {
01031                 ostringstream ost;
01032                 ost << "CComplexImage::SetROI() UL " << UL << " or LR " << LR << 
01033                         " outside image dimensions: " << CPoint2D<int>(GetMinX(),GetMinY()) <<
01034                         " - " << CPoint2D<int>(GetMaxX(),GetMaxY()) << IPLAddFileAndLine;
01035                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
01036                 return false;
01037         }
01038         m_ROIActive=true;
01039         m_ROIUpperLeft=UL;
01040         m_ROILowerRight=LR;
01041         return true;
01042 }
01043 
01044 } // end namespace ipl
01045 
01046 #endif //_IPL98_COMPLEX_IMAGE_H
01047
